game.name: Whimpact!
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Creature collection and co-op arena challenges come together in Whimpact! Collect, care for, and adventure alongside your Whims, who grant you incredible powers. Then dive into the fast-paced, cooperative arena to find and reclaim the world’s missing Starcane energy.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Creature collection and co-op arena challenges come together in Whimpact! Collect, care for, and adventure alongside your Whims, who grant you incredible powers. Then dive into the fast-paced, cooperative arena to find and reclaim the world’s missing Starcane energy.
